p: Food and nutrition security is a major challenge that our world is facing nowadays. Approximately two billion people are estimated to suffer from micronutrient deficiencies that make them more susceptible to disease, and this can be a significant obstacle to economic growth [ 1]. The issue of food security is severe, especially in largely import-dependent countries of sub-Saharan Africa [ 2]. However, the continent shows highly biodiverse environments with valuable, wild edible plants (WEPs) which are often neglected [ 3].
